title: Who Is the Prey - Novel Updates
genre: Adult   Drama   Mature   Psychological   Romance   Tragedy
tags: Abusive Characters   Adapted to Drama   Adapted to Manhua   Calm Protagonist   Cruel Characters   Depictions of Cruelty   Female Protagonist   Forced into a Relationship   Forced Marriage   Male Yandere   Manipulative Characters   Modern Day   Murders   Obsessive Love   Police   Possessive Characters   Pregnancy   Psychopaths   Revenge   R*pe   S*xual Abuse   Teachers   Unrequited Love   Yandere
author: 贝昕
description:
A ruthless man, an indomitable soul, and an entanglement that was wrong.

Four years ago, she sent him to jail and was only appeased when he was executed.

Four years later, he dragged her into hell. Despite seeing her hurt, his resentment failed to subside. This was a carefully prepared revenge, yet a relentless one. Fu Shenxing had always thought that He Yan would be in his palm.

Ultimately, who is the prey? Look in front, don’t fantasize about the gentleman’s soft-heartedness. Look behind, don’t expect the heroine to let go.>
